creator: cao@ispsoft.com
dfs@apache.org
text:
This is not a bug.  Please ask about a suspected bug on oro-dev or oro-user
before reporting it through Bugzilla.  Also please look at previously reported
bugs before reporting a bug.  Why this isn't a bug is fully explained in the
API documentation and the Perl perlre man page.  Please read both and look
specifically for the discussion of foo|foot in the documentation for
matches() and the perlre man page.
Closing on account of not being a bug.
creator: dfs@apache.org
